message:
Task complete.

Summary:
- Implemented an efficient solution in /workspace/solution.py using a Fenwick tree over adjacency array A (A[i]=1 iff s[i]==s[i+1]). Updates on flips toggle up to two A positions; queries check that the sum over A in the substring is 0.
- Created /workspace/evaluation.txt with the requested evaluation of the original naive solution.
- Verified correctness with the sample and extensive randomized tests; ran a micro-benchmark (N=200k, Q=200k) — completed quickly in this environment.
- Complexity: O((N + Q) log N) time, O(N) memory.

How to run:
- Provide input on stdin and run: python3 /workspace/solution.py
- The program prints one line per type-2 query (Yes/No).

No further action required.
